DOC.brief_summary: The main objective clinical study evaluate performance CT LUCIA 601 PY monocular uncorrected distance visual acuity compare reference monofocal IOL Acrysof IQ SN60WF .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Comparative Randomized Clinical Trial Evaluate Visual Performance Two Monofocal Intraocular Lenses
